features: 195 pieces with kid-safe electric drill – Nxone STEM toy set contains 195 pieces of blocks, a storage box and an electric drill, which brings more fun for boys and girls. An ideal builidng toy choice for up to 8 players at the same time.

Toys for boys and girls that encourage your child to learn through playing time - STEM toys are for developing your child's science, technology, engineering, and mathematic skills. It can easily improve children's imagination, creativity, hand-eye coordination, cognitive competence, operational and logical thinking ability during construction. What's more, when cooperating with others, children can enhance their teamwork and social skills.

Kid's safety is our top priority – All of our Nxone toys for boys and girls are certified to be Phthalate, Lead, Cadmium, and BPA free. Nxone building toys are also durable, contain no sharp edges, making sure your kids are 100% safe while playing.

Additional value - Our STEM educational toys are equipped with a newly upgraded electric drill which can lock the screws better between blocks. It also comes with a portable storage box which can improve children's organizational abilities. Meanwhile, with a detailed instruction booklet of model example, children can easily build a varity of shapes to get sense of achievement. Older kids can realize their imaginations and creativities through STEM toy's building blocks and modules.

Great gift choice - Our building blocks are made of high-quality and durable plastic pieces which would not make you regret your choice. They are especially created for boys and girls which are suitable for most children age 3 4 5 6 7 8 +. Great gift for surprise in daily life, party, birthday, Christmas!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 100% SAFE Nxone STEM toys for kids are made from materially safe ABS plastic, which is also washable, tasteless and durable, makes it hard to break when kids drop it carelessly. With round edges and simple operation, children can play it comfortably while parents have no additional worries! COLORFUL BLOCKS Nxone educational blocks select classical colors with medium and high saturation that can cultivate children's perception of colors from early childhoods and improve their abilities to distinguishing and recognizing different colors. MORE PIECES Nxone building toys for kids provide 90% more pieces than other similar sets, and can be played by several boys and girls together. Children can also easily construct various models like robot, elephant, dragonfly, tyrannosaurus, forklift, helicopter etc.

LEARNING DURING CONSTRUCTION STEM building toys are specifically made to enhance your children's Science, Technology, Engineering and Math skills which can have profound effect on kids' lives. It is crucial to choose a suitable toy to promote learning skills for children during early childhood. When kids are exposed to STEM training early on, they'll be able to learn the basic skills of forming more complex ideas at later age; helping them to be better equipped later on in life. Our NXONE toy building sets are especially created for boys and girls. The educational building blocks are suitable for most children and can be enjoyed by 3 4 5 6 7 8 years old or older.

STRONG & PORTABLE STORAGE BOX Nxone building blocks come with a strong and portable storage box with handle, and make the toys cleaning and sorting an easy process. It is also suitable to be carried by parents and kids to participate in camping, school, small party and other activities. MULTIPLE TOY DRILLS Along with the ordinary toy drill, we also provide an electric screwdriver which can adhere the screws better between the blocks. The kids can also use more ways to build the blocks by themselves or with other kids at the same time. MULTIPLE TOY DRILLS What's more, children can also create any models they can imagine. Create your own building shapes! You can find specific procedures for constructing 23 different models from the manual included in the box. If you need an e-book version, please find the "Product guides and documents" section to download it from our product page.

reviews.reviewerName: Easy to use, bright shimmery colors that add a pop to your alcohol ink masterpiece. I have asl used it to create a beautiful effect with acrylic paint.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Snap together toys
reviews.reviewText: My grandson is going to love this. Well made, heavy duty plastic, bright colors. Easy snap together, let their imagination run wild. Some small parts so parental supervision advised. The container serves as toy storage! Would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 4 yr oldGrandson loves taking things apart and putting them together. This was perfect. It is easy for him to do by himself

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for future engineers
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my kid (4yo) and he loves this. He does need some help with instructions, but he could build anything he comes up with himself. I wish the booklet had a bit more instructions (some models are just the picture so it leaves you to figuring out what pieces you need and what steps to take). Also, don't like that you can't buy spare parts separately. However, My kid and I love this so much I bought him a second one for Christmas so he could have more parts and wouldn't have to take apart his built robot(s) to build others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for Creative kids
reviews.reviewText: Pros: My grandson loves building with these and so does my 3 year old granddaughter.Cons: The eyeballs will not stay in not matter what we try - very disappointing when they are making animals and trying to play safari and dinosaurs.There are not enough body blocks - my grandson and granddaughter want to build several things to play but can really only build 1 main animal - robot each (I bought 2 sets) because there is only 1 big body block in each set.I would even be willing to buy additional body squares individually if I could just find them, but I can't.

reviews.reviewerName: This is my second pair of these same boots.  I was skeptical because the price was so reasonable but the y are well made and extremely comfortable (thus the second pair).  First pair lasted over a year of nearly every day use.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it
reviews.reviewText: This is my grandkids ages 4 to 7 toy of choice when they visit my house. There are so many creative things they can build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hours of fun
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 1st grade classroom. This is a classroom favorite. So many combinations that let creativity flow free. Kids look forward to playing this and are able to cooperatively build and create together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Kids love building. Bought for my class. Enjoyed seeing kids follow the directions and be proud of what they built. They love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very neat set!
reviews.reviewText: This set was great for fine motor skills and so much fun.
